title: Context-Based Second Language Vocabulary Acquisition Strategy Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic second-language learning experience or foundational understanding of language education theory
context.additional_context: Program for enhancing language education expertise for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can reproduce 50 target vocabulary items contextually using 10+ daily/academic contexts
Learners can construct a cognitive framework explaining the lexical formation processes (connection, extension, abstraction)
Learners can revise and improve vocabulary usage strategies 3+ times based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
